starts.title: Toss a piece of food into the other player's mouth
starts.extra: If it falls on the floor, thrower has to eat it

starts.title: Balance a cup of water on each other's head
starts.extra: ... Make it a cup of milk or soda

examples.title: Players toss an egg back and forth at increasing distances
Current player does a trust fall and dare acceptor catches them
examples.extra: Do the fall over a hard floor

examples.title: Both players balance on one foot while holding hands
Players pass a lit candle between them without blowing it out
Current player wears a blindfold and dare acceptor guides them through an obstacle course
Both players try to eat a messy food without using hands
Players play a game of 'hot potato' with an ice cube
Current player and dare acceptor swap shirts for the rest of the game
Both players whisper a secret to each other
examples.extra: Whisper it while maintaining eye contact

examples.title: Players compete in a staring contest
examples.extra: First to blink has to remove a clothing item

examples.title: Dare acceptor looks through current player's photos on their phone
examples.extra: Post a random photo to social media

examples.title: Flip a coin to determine which player has to remove a clothing item
examples.extra: Raise stakes to two clothing items

examples.title: Current player is blindfolded and guesses body part by smelling
Both players share a drink from the same glass without hands
examples.extra: Use only mouths to pass the glass

examples.title: Current player gives dare acceptor a massage with a risky object (e.g., ice)
Both players draw on each other's skin with washable marker
Current player and dare acceptor kiss through a piece of paper
Both players take a selfie in a compromising position

examples.title: Both players streak naked outside to the mailbox and back
examples.extra: Do a 30-second dance at the mailbox

examples.title: Dare acceptor gets to spank current player on the bare butt
examples.extra: Use a household object for spanking

examples.title: Current player receives a lapdance from dare acceptor
Current player is blindfolded while dare acceptor touches their body however they like
